function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased annoyance ratings due to neighbor noise during lockdown","Impact":"Decreased quality of life, stress, and discomfort","Mitigation":"Improved soundproofing, communication with neighbors, and noise regulations","Technologies":"Soundproofing materials, noise-canceling devices, and community engagement platforms","People":"Residents of flats and houses","Owner":"Community organizations, local governments, and residents"},{"Description":"Inconsistency in noise annoyance research results","Impact":"Ineffective noise management policies and recommendations","Mitigation":"Standardized research methodologies, comprehensive data collection, and interdisciplinary collaboration","Technologies":"Data gathering and analysis tools, research coordination platforms, and interdisciplinary communication channels","People":"Academic researchers, urban planners, and policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, and urban planning organizations"},{"Description":"Changes in neighbor and outdoor noise patterns during lockdown","Impact":"Discrepancies in noise regulations and environmental impact assessments","Mitigation":"Regular noise monitoring, flexible noise ordinances, and public awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Noise monitoring devices, geographic information systems, and social media advocacy tools","People":"Residents, urban developers, and environmental agencies","Owner":"Environmental agencies, local governments, and community organizations"}]}
